entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Woodstock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:34 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Woodstock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:33 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Woodstock 02:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: -5.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -7.0°C
Wind: ESE 18 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of freezing rain or snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with ice pellets changing to freezing rain or ice pellets in the morning then to flurries in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
